Class HttpRestHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
      org.waarp.gateway.kernel.rest.HttpRestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelHandler, ChannelUpstreamHandler
public abstract class HttpRestHandler
extends SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler

protected abstract  void checkConnection(Channel channel)
          To be used for instance to check correctness of connection

for instance, if X-AUTH is included
check if in uri or header, X-AUTH is present and check X-AUTH argument (known, any key if present)
then get timestamp and check is correct (|curtime - timestamp| < maxinterval)
then get all uri args in alphabetic lower case order
hash using SHA-1 all args (in order including timestamp)
compare sha-1 hashedkey with the computed one

          Clean method Override if needed

checkConnection

protected abstract void checkConnection(Channel channel)
                                 throws HttpInvalidAuthenticationException
To be used for instance to check correctness of connection

for instance, if X-AUTH is included
check if in uri or header, X-AUTH is present and check X-AUTH argument (known, any key if present)
then get timestamp and check is correct (|curtime - timestamp| < maxinterval)
then get all uri args in alphabetic lower case order
hash using SHA-1 all args (in order including timestamp)
compare sha-1 hashedkey with the computed one

Parameters:
channel -
Throws:
HttpInvalidAuthenticationException

computeBaseAuthent

public static String computeBaseAuthent(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode arguments,
                                        String extraKey)
                                 throws HttpIncorrectRequestException
for instance, if X-AUTH is included
check if in uri or header, X-AUTH is present and check X-AUTH argument (known, any key if present)
then get timestamp and check is correct (|curtime - timestamp| < maxinterval)
then get all uri args in alphabetic lower case order
hash using SHA-1 all args (in order including timestamp)
compare sha-1 hashedkey with the computed one

Parameters:
arguments - contains ARG_PATH, ARGS_URI
Returns:
the authentication string if any that should be compared with ARG_X_AUTH_KEY
Throws:
HttpIncorrectRequestException
